meanings: on the occasion of a festival

examples.korean: The whole town is in festive mood. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 소도시 전체가 축제 분위기이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The whole town is in festive mood. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The wedding was an occasion of great festivity. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 결혼식은 크게 축제 기분을 낼 수 있는 행사였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The wedding was an occasion of great festivity. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The town springs into life during the carnival. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 축제 기간이 되면 그 소도시는 갑자기 활기를 띠기 시작한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The town springs into life during the carnival. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I declare this festival open. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 축제의 개막을 선언합니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I declare this festival open. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There is a local carnival every year. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 매년 지역 축제가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
